implements java.io.Serializable

    • Constructor Detail

      • Planet

        public Planet(double radius,
              double angle,
              Game g,
              double grav,
              double size)
        Creates a Planet object.
        Parameters:
        radius - The distance at which the planet orbits the sun.
        angle - The polar angle at which the planet starts.
        g - The Game object in which it is created.
        grav - The acceleration due to the gravity of the planet.
        size - The visual size of the planet.

    • Method Detail

      • orbit

        public void orbit()
        Tells the planet to take one step forward. Planets are on rails, so it only rotates about the center.

      • getMass

        public double getMass()
        Gives the mass of the planet.
        Returns:
        The mass of the planet.

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Returns:
        The planet's radius.

      • getVel

        public double getVel()
        Returns:
        The velocity of the planet.

      • getOrbVel

        public double getOrbVel()
        Returns:
        The orbital velocity of the planet.

      • getR

        public double getR()
        Returns:
        The height at which the planet orbits.

        Overrides:
